name: NGO Monitor
goal: NGO Monitor provides information and analysis, promotes accountability, and supports discussion on the reports and activities of NGOs (non-governmental organizations) claiming to advance human rights and humanitarian agendas.
interests: Budget, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection
euInitiatives: Following European Parliament human rights and humanitarian CSO's in order contribute to an evidence-based public debate.
